attributes.action: Oppose the mandatory double jab access to crowded places for people 35 & under.
attributes.additional_details: Studies show that the survival rate for COVID-19 in people under 35 years old is 99%. This rule has been introduced to force ages 18-35 to have the vaccines by taking away their human rights and targeting their culture. The vaccine does not stop anyone contracting or transmitting the virus and therefor a negative test should be the only sufficient means of entry.
attributes.background: I’m creating this petition to oppose the latest announcement that from September, in order to enter a night club, you will be required to be double vaccinated and that proof of a negative test will ‘no longer be sufficient’.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
